arts.ttl: 5 Spurs stars likely to sit it out as Aston Villa welcome back 6
arts.sum: Jadon Sancho, Emiliano Buendia, and Tyrone Mings should be available for the bench after recent recoveries. Donyell Malen has earned a start following a superb brace in Villa's last win against Burnley, while Morgan Rogers is hitting form in attack. arts.ttl: Unai Emery expects tough trip to Tottenham Hotspur
arts.sum: “Of course, Ange Postecoglou, he got it as a coach and now with Thomas Frank, this season, he is starting very, very motivated because through Champions League they are adding another competition in Europe, the most important. Unai Emery applauded the work of Thomas Frank as the new head coach of Tottenham .

arts.ttl: Mathys Tel, Wilson Odobert, Kolo Muani: Who could feature in Thomas Frank's team against Aston Villa?
arts.sum: Considering this, there could be some changes to the side who took a 2-1 win away from Leeds United right before the break, however Frank was full of praise for Mathys Tel and Wilson Odobert, suggesting the pair could be making another feature on Sunday. The last time the pair faced each other was at the end of the 2024/25 season in May, where the Lilywhites left Villa Park with no points after a dismal 2-0 loss – meaning no improvement on league position, and being a contributing factor to former head coach Ange Postecoglou being released by the club at the end of that season.
